games.title: Touhou 7.5 - Immaterial and Missing Power
games.desc: There's a feast in 3 days, but while preparing for it, the girls are distracted by a strange mist that seems to have been happening around this same time for several years now. It isn't exactly a problem by itself, but since nobody knows what it is or where it came from, everyone tends to be suspicious of each other during the feast, which hasn't made it a very fun event these past few years. This year, the girls are determined to figure out the cause of this weird mist so that everyone can have a good time at the feast.

games.title: Touhou 10.5 - Scarlet Weather Rhapsody
games.desc: An earthquake has flattened the Hakurei Shrine. However, even more unusual than that, strange and unseasonable weather has literally been following our girls around - for example, wherever Reimu goes, it's sunny; where Marisa goes, it drizzles - the list goes on. This afflicts all the initially playable girls on the roster (13), who investigate the incident.

games.title: Touhou 12.3 - Hisoutensoku
games.desc: Three of our girls (Cirno, Meiling, and Sanae) have spotted a giant silhouette in the distance, and have decided they're going to figure out what it is.

games.title: Touhou 13.5 - Hopeless Masquerade
games.desc: Seeing all these incidents occurring out of their control, the Human Village has fallen into a state of disorder and nihilism. Believing that some religion could restore order, some of Gensokyo's most prominent representatives of Shinto, Buddhism, and Taoism take this opportunity to convert the public to their faith by demonstrating their abilities in battle to a live audience to promote faith in their religion.

games.title: Touhou 14.5 - Urban Legend in Limbo
games.desc: Urban legends have begun circulating through the Human Village, scaring the kids and worrying the adults. Of course, our girls aren't afraid of a few rumors, but they're following the Gensokyo girls around. At first, since it was discovered that these anomalies could be controlled as long as the host did not fear them, they simply treated them as playthings, because they could - until one night, when things started going wrong...

games.title: Touhou 15.5 - Antinomy of Common Flowers
games.desc: With the Urban Legend incident still ongoing, a new urban legend comes into play; Perfect Possession. This phenomenon allows one person to take control over another person’s body. And of course, there exists those who seek to use this phenomenon for their own benefit…

games.title: Touhou 17.5 - Sunken Fossil World
games.desc: A 2D barrage action game in which you control girls with mysterious powers and aim to solve incidents. When enemies stand in his way, he sometimes avoids the overwhelming barrage that comes, and sometimes uses water that is harmless to attack to get through, and by using the water that overflows on the battlefield, he unleashes a powerful attack "Spell Card" and wins the duel. It is a game of bargaining. You can choose from multiple main characters, and you can enjoy different developments depending on the individuality of the story and game content. Destroy countless barrages and rivals, and see with your own eyes the cause of this world's disaster.
games.genre: Horizontal Side-scrolling Bullet Hell Water Action Game
